query: WITH entities AS (SELECT created_at, id FROM policies WHERE (COALESCE((created_at, id) > ($3, $2), $2 IS NULL)) ORDER BY created_at, id LIMIT $1) SELECT i.id AS "entity_id: PolicyId", e.sequence, e.event, e.recorded_at FROM entities i JOIN policy_events e ON i.id = e.id ORDER BY i.created_at, i.id, i.id, e.sequence
